snippet.title: Gunster Archive - Metal Breaker
snippet.description:
An Asteroids/Pang-style mini-game where the player is tasked with destroying as many ball-shaped enemies as possible. The first stage consists of a single enemy. The second, one enemy that splits into two upon death. The third, an enemy that splits into two twice over. And so on, until stage 6, where instead of additional layers of enemy, all sizes of enemy (except the smallest) will begin to shoot at you. From then on, an additional starter enemy will be added every stage.

The large hill in the center of the stage spawns either a health item or a defense item every 20 seconds. The smaller hill to the right spawns either a health item (40%) or a grenade refill (60%) every 21 seconds. Additionally, the upper 2/3s of the screen will spawn a randomly selected battle mode item (health, grenades, rocket launcher, flame thrower, offense boost, defense boost, invisibility, or speed boost) every 20 seconds.

Usage of Grenade Launcher-type weapons is disabled, as weapons that deal splash damage are capable of killing multiple waves of enemies at once.

0:00 Menus
0:18 Stage 1
0:27 Stage 2
0:44 Stage 3
1:01 Stage 4
1:28 Stage 5
1:59 Stage 6
2:40 Stage 7
3:52 Stage 8

Footage was recorded on a private server using the Japanese version of the game with some English assets.
